title: Mammoth Cave National Park: On the Rivers
body: On the Rivers          Â       Over 30 miles of the Green and Nolin Rivers trace through the park and offer a wealth of recreational opportunities. Angle for muskellunge, bluegill, catfish, bass, perch, crappie, and other game fish. Canoe or kayak the rivers looking for wildlife, springs and river bluffs. Camp on islands or in the floodplain, or by the river at the Houchin Ferry Campground.
